data.meta_description: App-Based Personal Spirometer (PEF, FEV1). Peak Flow and FEV1 now available on your Smart Phone and Tablet, via Bluetooth Smart 4.0.
data.text:
Description

Includes: 1 Reusable Orange Turbine and Plastic Mouthpiece, 2 AAA Batteries and 1 Users Manual

Other Information

App-Based Personal Spirometer (PEF,FEV1).

Personal, Smart! Peak Flow and FEV1 now available on your Smart Phone and Tablet, via Bluetooth Smart 4.0

Ideal in the self management of Asthma, COPD, Lung Transplant care, Cystic Fibrosis and for use in Clinical Trials.

Covered by Medicare: approved by the CMS (U.S. Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services) as a Durable Medical Equipment (DME) item.

Suitable for everyone and all ages from 5-93 years.

The compatible App (named Smart One) is available for iOS and Android with unlimited Online Free Updates.

App provides visual incentives to assist in producing accurate test results.

Ability to trend test results over time.

Ability to generate reports enabling users to send test results via text or email.
